# Alien Communication
## Overview
You may not be particularly suave with your three tongues, but you have an uncanny knack of getting across information via your antennaeâ€”a knowledge you can use to your advantage.

## Requirements and Restrictions
**Prerequisite**: *[[Hoyrall]]*

## Effects
You gain the following benefits:

- You can communicate with up to 2 allied creatures that can clearly see your antennae twitch at will as if using *telepathic bond*.
- You no longer suffer disadvantage to Charisma (Deception) checks.
- You increase your Charisma score by 2 to a maximum of 20.
